column2: ENGLISH
Settle Province
column6: Asentarse en la provincia

column2: Assign your [GetTreasurerName] to bring more of your people into the province to settle its lands, increasing the chance its culture will change to §Y[Culture.GetName]§!, if it is not already, or that a city will be built there if it is. (NOTE: The latter is only available to Tribal rulers.)
column6: Asigna a tu [GetTreasurerName] para atraer más gente y asentarse en estas tierras, aumentando la posibilidad de que la cultura cambie a §Y[Culture.GetName]§!, si no lo es ya, o que se construya una ciudad. (NOTA: Esto último solo está disponible para gobiernantes tribales.)

column2: New City Construction
column6: Construir ciudad

column2: The people and merchants of the province are working to build a city, a process that could take up to ten years or more to complete.
column6: La gente y los mercaderes de esta provincia estan construyendo una nueva ciudad, un proceso que puede llevar diez años o más completar.

column2: New Temple Construction
column6: Construir templo

column2: The people of the province are working to build a new temple, a process that could take anywhere up to twenty years to complete.
column6: La gente de esta provincia está construyendo un nuevo templo, un proceso que puede llevar hasta veinte años completar.

column2: Helped Temple Construction
column6: Ha ayudado a construir un templo

column2: Refused to Help Temple
column6: Ha rechazado ayudar a construir un templo

column2: Building New Temple
column6: Construyendo templo nuevo

column2: This character is in the midst of building a new temple, a task that could take up to twenty years...if it ever gets completed.
column6: Este personaje está construyendo un nuevo templo, una tarea que puede llevar hasta veinte años... si esque alguna vez se completa.

column2: Inform [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] of the chance to build a city in [Root.Location.GetName]
column6: Informarl[Root.Liege.GetEA] de la posibilidad de construir una ciudad en [Root.Location.GetName]

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] decides to use [From.GetHerHis] own wealth to fund the temple\n
column6: [From.GetTitledFirstName] decide usar su riqueza para fundar un templo\n

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] abandons [From.GetHerHis] dream...\n
column6: [From.GetTitledFirstName] abandona su sueño...\n

column2: Will continue building the temple\n
column6: Continua construyendo el templo\n

column2: Work on the city construction will continue.\n
column6: El trabajo de construcción en la ciudad continúa.\n

column2: Work on the city construction will be delayed considerably.\n
column6: El trabajo de construcción en la ciuad se demorará considerablemente.\n

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has asked for an audience with you: 'My [Root.GetLordLady], a vision of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] came to me and commanded I build a temple in [temple_province.GetName]. I will need your help, however, for I'm uncertain I can complete this grand project on my own.'
column6: [From.GetTitledFirstName] ha solicitado una audiencia: Mi [Root.GetLordLady], se me apareció [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] y me ordenó construir un nuevo templo en [temple_province.GetName]. Pero necesitaré tu ayuda, pues es un proyecto ambicioso y no sé si podré llevarlo a cabo yo sol[From.GetOA]

column2: Take this, and my blessing
column6: Toma esto, y mi bendición

column2: I shall appeal to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faithful on your behalf
column6: Me dirijiré a los fieles [Root.Religion.GetName] en tu nombre

column2: The lords and ladies of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] will all help you
column6: Los señores y señoras de [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] te ayudarán

column2: I can spare you nothing
column6: No puedo prescindir de nada

column2: I fear I can be of no help to you, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column6: Me temo que no puedo ayudarte, [From.GetTitledFirstName]

column2: With the death of [From.GetTitledFirstName], so dies [From.GetHerHis] dream of building a new [From.Religion.GetName] temple in [temple_province.GetName]...
column6: Con la muerte de [From.GetTitledFirstName], muere su sueño de construir un nuevo templo [From.Religion.GetName] en [temple_province.GetName]...

column2:
My [Root.GetLordLady],
Would that I could continue construction of the new temple in [temple_province.GetName], but seeing as I am not longer of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faithful, I suspect that would not be advisable. If you can find another to take my place, I recommend that you do so.

With great respect,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
Mi [Root.GetLordLady],
Ojalá pudiera continuar la construcción del nuevo templo en [temple_province.GetName], pero dado que ya no soy [Root.Religion.GetName], no sería aconsejable. Te recomendaría que encontraras a alguien para relevarme.

Con grandes respetos,
[From.GetTitledName]

column2:
My [Root.GetLordLady],
Would that I could continue construction of the new temple in [temple_province.GetName], but seeing as I am not longer [Root.Culture.GetName], I suspect that would not be in either of our interests. If you can find another to take my place, I recommend that you do so.

With great respect,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
Mi [Root.GetLordLady],
Ojalá pudiera continuar la construcción del nuevo templo en [temple_province.GetName], pero dado que ya no soy [Root.Culture.GetName], no sería de nuestro interés. Te recomendaría que encontraras a alguien para relevarme.

Con grandes respetos,
[From.GetTitledName]

column2:
My [Root.GetLordLady],
Would that I could continue construction of the new temple in [temple_province.GetName] as planned, but my duties in the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] take me away from such matters. If you can find another to take my place, I recommend that you do so.

With great respect,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
Mi [Root.GetLordLady],
Ojalá pudiera continuar la construcción del nuevo templo en [temple_province.GetName], pero mis obligaciones en el [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] me alejan de estos asuntos. Te recomendaría que encontraras a alguien para relevarme.

Con grandes respetos,
[From.GetTitledName]

column2: While the construction of the new temple in [temple_province.GetName] has been ongoing, it seems that [From.GetTitledFirstName] is no longer in any condition to continue it. Many fear that unless [From.GetSheHe] miraculously recovers [From.GetHerHis] mind or someone else is found to take [From.GetHerHis] place, the project will never finish.
column6: Aunque la construcción del nuevo templo en [temple_province.GetName] ha estado en curso, parece que [From.GetTitledFirstName] no se encuentra en condiciones de continuar. Muchos temen que si no se mejora milagrosamente o se encuentra un sustituto, el proyecto no finalizará.

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s imprisonment has halted all construction of the new temple in [temple_province.GetName]. The people are quickly scattering to the winds, returning to their homes...unless someone appears to take [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s place, all hope of it finishing will be lost.
column6: El encarcelamiento de [From.GetTitledFirstName] ha detenido la construcción del templo en [temple_province.GetName]. La gente se está dispersando rápidamente y regresando a sus hogares... a no ser que se encuentre sustituto para [From.GetTitledFirstName], toda esperanza de ver el proyecto acabado finalizará.

column2:
My [Root.GetLordLady],
Would that I had better news to give you. I fear the site where I'd hoped to erect the [Root.Religion.GetName] temple is no longer suitable. Unless somewhere else can be found, I  shall have to abandon my quest in disgrace.

With respect,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
Mi [Root.GetLordLady],
Ojalá tuviera mejores noticias que daros. Me temo que el lugar elegido para erigir un nuevo templo [Root.Religion.GetName] no es apropido. Si no se encuentra un lugar más apropiado, tendré que abandonar el proyecto en desgracia.

Con grandes respetos,
[From.GetTitledName]

column2: I have just the place in mind...
column6: Me viene a la cabeza un lugar...

column2: Sadly, there is nothing that can be done
column6: Desgraciadamente, nada puede hacerse

column2: With no-one to urge the locals to continue working, the temple construction in [From.GetName] has been halted. Unless someone can be found to resume the task, it will have to be abandoned.
column6: Sin nadie que inste a los lugareños a trabajar, la construcción del templo en [From.GetName] se ha detenido. Si no encontramos a nadie que continúe la tarea, ésta se abandonará.

column2: Someone will be found to continue construction
column6: Encontraremos a alguien que continúe la construcción

column2: Pay for it myself
column6: Pagarlo de mi bolsillo

column2: Ask my liege for help
column6: Pedir ayuda a mi señor

column2:
My [Root.GetLordLady],
Construction efforts on the new [Root.Religion.GetName] temple in [temple_province.GetName] have encountered unforeseen difficulties, and I fear I am completely without resources to continue. I beg you for coin, and I swear by [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] it will be put to good use.

Your humble servant,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
column6:
Mi [Root.GetLordLady],
La construcción del nuevo templo [Root.Religion.GetName] en [temple_province.GetName] ha encontrado algunos imprevistos, y me temo que no tengo suficientes recursos para continuar. Te ruego unas monedas, y te juro por [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] que les daré un buen uso.

Tu humilde sierviente,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

column2: Of course I will help [From.GetHerHim]
column6: Por supuesto que [From.GetRleRla] ayudaré

column2: I can offer [From.GetHerHim] nothing
column6: No puedo ofrecerle nada

column2: Good news! [From.GetFirstName] has completed work on the new [From.Religion.GetName] temple, assuming [From.GetHerHis] place as its [From.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]. All of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] rejoices, and a week of celebration has been called for.
column6: ¡Buenas noticias! [From.GetFirstName] ha comletado su trabajo en el nuevo templo [From.Religion.GetName], asumiendo su papel como  assuming [From.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]. Todo el [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] se regocija, y se ha convocado una semana de celebraciones.

column2: New City Construction
column6: Construir nueva ciudad

column2: It has taken years, but finally you have located a suitable site in [Root.Location.GetName] which is both defensible as well as suitable for merchants and tribal leaders alike to gather in a city.
I should tell [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] at once!

Your [Root.GetTreasurerName], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has discovered a site in [new_city_location.GetName] suitable for building a new city, a place which both merchants and [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] leaders believe could support a large number of your people. It will, however, require a fair investment of both time and effort.
My coffers will fund this project
Everyone in [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] will participate
We cannot afford such an indulgence
The war raging in [Root.GetName] has ruined the construction that was underway for the new city. The effort will need to be restarted from scratch.

There is an issue with the city construction currently underway in [Root.GetName]: a fire destroyed a number of buildings after an accident, and there is a rumor amongst the workers that the site is haunted. It will take considerable convincing to get work to continue.
Additional coin will convince them, I'm certain
They will continue because the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] tells them to!
Then we must abandon the project

It seems several of your overseers have pushed the workers too far. There have been several riots in [Root.GetName], and while construction has not been delayed yet it certainly may come to that if the riots spread further.
We will need to keep an eye on things

A dispute has arisen with merchants in [Root.GetName], many of whom are unaccustomed to the idea of setting up in buildings as we are asking them to. They prefer their traditional methods, they say. Unless we get the merchants on board with the new city, it will never be completed.
I will negotiate with these merchants myself
Send [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] to negotiate with them
Round up a few and execute them, to show them their place
They are holding out for more coin, I suspect
We have no choice but to abandon the project
After years of effort, the new city in [Root.GetName] is finally complete!
